TextBody:
Hello,

Yes, NATing or port forwarding from a public IP should allow the Epp client to communicate with the Epp server. Please be sure the method you use does not add SSL termination, as this can affect the client-server certificate.

Kind regards
__________________
Andrei Pop | Technical Support Engineer
Netwrix Endpoint Protector
